php:
<?php
$today = date("D");
switch($today){
  case "Mon":
    echo "Today is Monday. Clean your house.";
    break;
  case "Tue":
    echo "Today is Tuesday. Buy some food.";
    break;
  case "Wed":
    echo "Today is Wednesday. Visit a doctor.";
    break;
  default:
    echo "No information available for that day.";
    break;
}
?>
